text: The 2013–14 season was the 45th campaign of the Scottish Men's National League, the national basketball league of Scotland. The season featured 10 teams. Falkirk Fury won their 3rd league title. The season started on 6 September 2013 and ended with the Play-off Final on 6 April 2014. ==Teams== The line-up for the 2013-2014 season features the following teams: ===Division 1=== *Boroughmuir Blaze *City of Edinburgh Kings *Clark Eriksson Fury *Dunfermline Reign *Glasgow Rocks II *Glasgow Storm *Glasgow University *St Mirren West College Scotland *Stirling Knights *Troon Tornadoes ==League== ==Playoffs== ===Quarter-finals=== ===Semi-finals=== ===Final=== ==References== Scottish Basketball League website: https://web.archive.org/web/20160304185323/http://snbl.leaguerepublic.com/l/fg/1_150622922.html#tab2 Category:Scottish Basketball Championship Men seasons Scot Scot basketball basketball
title: 2013–14 Scottish Men's National League season
